statements: UPDATE transportation_data SET trip_date = '2022-07-15', trip_duration_minutes = 120 WHERE trip_id = 101
UPDATE transportation_data SET end_location = 'New York', mode_of_transport = 'Bus' WHERE trip_id = 102
UPDATE transportation_data SET trip_duration_minutes = 90, mode_of_transport = 'Train' WHERE trip_id = 101
UPDATE transportation_data SET start_location = 'Airport', end_location = 'Hotel', trip_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE trip_id = 102
UPDATE transportation_usage SET start_location = 'Home', end_location = 'Work', trip_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE transportation_modes SET average_speed = 60.5, carbon_footprint = 0.75 WHERE mode_id = 3;
UPDATE transportation_usage SET end_location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 123 AND trip_id = 456;
UPDATE transportation_modes SET carbon_footprint = 3.5, average_speed = 50.5 WHERE mode_name = 'car';
UPDATE transportation_routes SET route_type='Bus' WHERE route_id=1;
UPDATE transportation_stops SET stop_location='City Center' WHERE stop_id=2;
UPDATE transportation_routes SET route_name = 'New Route 1', route_type = 'Bus' WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE transportation_stops SET stop_name = 'Station A', stop_location = 'Main Street' WHERE stop_id = 5;
UPDATE transportation_routes SET route_type='Bus', route_distance=10.5 WHERE route_id=1;
UPDATE transportation_schedules SET arrival_time='2022-08-15 08:30:00' WHERE schedule_id=3;
UPDATE transportation_routes SET route_name = 'New Route Name', route_distance = 75.25 WHERE route_id = 101;
UPDATE transportation_schedules SET departure_time = '2022-08-15 08:00:00', arrival_time = '2022-08-15 12:30:00' WHERE schedule_id = 201;
UPDATE users SET city='New York' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE transport_modes SET type_of_transport='Public' WHERE mode_id=3 AND carbon_emission_per_km<0.1;
UPDATE transportation_usage SET distance_traveled = 15.5 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE users SET city = 'New York', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 456
